# IP

**Structure**

The system definition of the Internet Protocol (IP).

## Declaration

```swift
struct IP
```

## Overview

Can be used to insert IP into a protocol stack.



## Initializers

- **init()**

## Instance Methods

- **fragmentationDisabled(_:)**: Configure IP to disable fragmentation on outgoing packets.
- **hopLimit(_:)**: Configure the IP hop limit.
- **localAddressPreference(_:)**: Specify a preference selecting the local addresses to use with outbound connections.
- **minimumMTU(_:)**: Configure IP to use the minimum MTU value.
- **multicastLoopbackDisabled(_:)**: Specify if multicast packets should be looped back for local delivery.
- **receiveTimeCalculated(_:)**: Configure IP to calculate receive time for inbound packets.
- **version(_:)**: Specify a single version of the Internet Protocol to allow.

## Conforms To

- NetworkProtocolOptions
